hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy and data security are fundamental to us

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: DocumentoIQ ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform for intelligent document processing.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: When you register or use our services, we may collect: name, email address, company name, billing information, and contact details.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our platform, including: documents processed, features used, access logs, IP address, browser type, and device information.

documents.title: Document Content
documents.content: Documents you upload are processed securely and temporarily stored for analysis. We do not use document content for purposes other than providing our services.

items.service: To provide, maintain, and improve our document processing services
items.communication: To send you service updates, support responses, and important notifications
items.security: To protect against fraud, unauthorized access, and security threats
items.compliance: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms of service
items.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and improve our platform's performance

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data only in these circumstances:

items.serviceProviders: With trusted service providers who assist in platform operations (under strict confidentiality agreements)
items.legal: When required by law, court order, or government regulation
items.business: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets (with notice to users)
items.consent: With your explicit consent for specific purposes

items.access: Strict access controls and authentication protocols
items.storage: Secure data storage with regular backups
items.monitoring: Continuous security monitoring and threat detection

items.access: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
items.delete: Request deletion of your personal data
items.object: Object to processing of your data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience. See our Cookie Policy for details.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Document content is processed and stored temporarily, then securely deleted according to our retention policy.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your data may be processed in countries outside your jurisdiction. We ensure adequate protection through standard contractual clauses and security measures.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or platform notification.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at:
